::Feline:

She looked and watched Iron Raptor enter the room.  Feline was 
=
sitting in a chair with her knees together and hands sitting 
nervously in =
her lap.  "Please to meet you Iron Raptor. I'm Feline."  
She looked at her=
 hands.  "You wanted to know how I came here? By the 
blessing of the blesi=
ng of the Matrix is how I came here." She looked 
downa nd had an expressio=
n of giult and sadness on her face.  "You 
asked me what my function is and=
 what I wish to become while I'm 
here.  I am a Bio-technologist and a figh=
er." She  looked up at Iron 
Raptor with a little happiness in her eyes.
"M=
y pod laned in the jungle.  I had just emerged from my pod in this 
cat for=
m.  I looked and saw wonderous plants and and animals around.  
I think I c=
an try to take one of the plants and... " She smiled 
nervously,"I'm sorry,=
 I let myself carry on sometimes when something 
gets interesting. Anyway, =
I was looking around when I was struck from 
behind. I woke up in the Allie=
nce base.  They wanted to know who I 
was and whom I followed.  They wanted=
 to know who my leader was.  I 
told them that I had just arrived to the pl=
anet and had no leader 
yet. They didn't believe me and hit me." she looked=
 down and away 
from Iron Raptor.  She got up and walked to the corner of t=
he room. 
"Because I have a sleek and feline figure they thought I was a pl=
ay 
toy."  she started to cry.  "They.....I...i had no choice, they said 
t=
hey were going to terminate me if I didn't let them..." she choked 
and cov=
ered her face with both hands.  "I..I couldn't stop them."  
She fell to he=
r knees and cried. 

She wept for a few moments. "I waited until I saw my c=
hance for 
escape.  I crawled down a small waste hatch and fell to the grou=
nd 
outside.  I was feeling like the filth I was covered in. They came 
aft=
er me and I just kept running.  I had to get away. "she started 
choking ag=
ain.  "I couldn't go back and let them.....again...not 
again."  She wept. =
 " I wandered around, damaged, having no idea 
where I was or where I was g=
oing.  I stumbled and found your ship by 
the grace of the Matrix.  It was =
sheer luck that that I even lived 
long enough to make it here. " She kept =
her face covered with her 
hands and stayed on her knees crying in the corn=
er.

ually do so.

hat she could. *

wards the smaller Conference Room, thinking that Feline had waited

e long enough and it was time to get down to work.

king over her shoulder-plate. *

e

eady to open in case Chardate would wish to enter.

range to her.

 iron will she pushed them down and approached the cat-

at and coming to rest standing in front of a holo-

er the piece of equipment for a moment then

he said this into the console, her back set towards Feline with

still clasped behind her back. But then, slowly and a

ed towards the cat-bot, her expression one of

ority. One that she used a bit too often
